trends: There has been one other sighting in Olivet
There were no other sightings in Olivet on or around April 27th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsA friend of mine lives on campus over at Olivet. I saw on a social network some photos he posted. He said that he was one of the only person, not the only person, to see this UFO. He said that it was moving around when he took photos of it. I later researched about Olivet and found that Olivet is known for supernatural things happening but more like Ghosts and things like that happening.
